title: National Hockey League - Florida Panthers home attendance 2005 to 2019
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 2 lines namely Total attendance, and Average attendance. The y axis represents Home attendance and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Total attendance is gradually decreasing, Average attendance is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Total attendance, and lastly, 2. Average attendance.
Throughout the period, Total attendance generally had the highest Home attendance relative to others with an average of 592771.79, and it reached its maximum at 2011/12 with a value of 681763.0.
Average attendance mostly had the least Home attendance with a mean value of 14960.64, which peaked at 2012/13 with a value of 16991.0.

The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Total attendance, and lastly, 2. Average attendance.
